loc_info:
• KtB Location ID: Down-61 (Outer)
  • oriented to the outside, meaning best viewed from the Clemente (6th Street) Bridge
  • on the down-river side of the bridge (the side facing 6th street and PNC Park)
  • 61/149 (41%) of the way across the bridge (starting from the Downtown end)
  • closest marker: Streetlight B1-12, which is 2 spaces closer to North Shore
  • closest landmark: Below an Andy Warhol hanging banner, which is 18 panels closer to Downtown
